name: Foxgloves
description:
Foxgloves is a screen print of an original ink drawing. It has been hand painted and further embellished with additional hand drawn marks.

Paper dimensions (approx) 8" x 10" or 20.3cm x 25.4.
Strictly Limited Edition of 20
Hand signed and numbered by the artist.
FRAME NOT INCLUDED

Please visit http://kerrylemonprints.blogspot.com/ to see the step-by-step process of creating these handmade prints.

I use Saunders Waterford high white paper which is a traditionally made English Watercolour paper made using 100% cotton to archival standards. I use their HP (Hot pressed) paper as it's smooth and allows a clean print from the screen as well as enabling a good watercolour wash. The printing ink I use is waterbased and has excellent lightfastness. Obviously I would advise against hanging this work in direct sunlight due to the delicate nature of watercolour paints.

Please note that as each print is created by hand, every piece is an original work which will have unique differences. Your print may therefore vary slightly from the one in the photo, but please be assured that I have worked hard to ensure that every print is beautiful.

(Please be aware that colours may vary slightly depending on your computer monitor.)

This piece will be carefully packed for you with a firm backing in an archival sleeve inside a rigid board mailer. Inside the sleeve is a information sheet giving further information about the artist (pictured) and so is a perfect gift.

UK Shipping:
Your item will be shipped with Royal Mail Special Delivery™. This gives you guaranteed delivery, online tracking, and electronic proof of delivery. All items are sent within 10 days of payment clearing (excluding weekends and holidays) If for any reason this is not possible you will be contacted.

Worldwide Shipping:
Your item will be shipped worldwide using the Royal Mail Airsure®. This is a fast, secure and reliable service which has priority handling in the UK and abroad and online tracking and delivery confirmation. All items are shipped within 10 days of payment clearing (excluding weekends and holidays). If for any reason this is not possible you will be contacted.

You can find out more about me by visiting http://www.kerrylemon.co.uk

If you have any questions about this piece then please do not hesitate to get in touch x
